title: Phase 3: Portfolio Management
description: Portfolio CRUD, holdings with tax lot tracking, CSV import/export, portfolio metrics (value, gain/loss, sector allocation, weighted scores), frontend portfolio manager and dashboard. See BUILD_PLAN.md.
close_reason: Phase 3 complete: portfolio CRUD, holdings, metrics, CSV import/export, frontend portfolio page

title: Phase 4: Conversational Interface
description: Chat backend with orchestrator, intent classification, agent routing. Agents: fundamentals analyst, earnings analyst, portfolio advisor. Conversation storage, frontend chat UI with message history. See BUILD_PLAN.md.

title: Phase 7: Testing & Launch
description: Unit tests (scoring engine), integration tests (API), E2E tests (critical flows), API docs, user guide, performance/load testing, security review, beta deployment and user onboarding. See BUILD_PLAN.md.

title: Phase 5: Earnings & RAG
description: Earnings data pipeline, transcript ingestion, RAG search, earnings analyst agent

title: Phase 1: Core Data & Stock Lookup
description: Stock search, fundamental data fetching, caching, stock detail UI

title: Phase 5: Earnings & RAG
description: Earnings data pipeline, transcript ingestion with chunking + embeddings, RAG search over transcripts (pgvector), Earnings Analyst agent with citations, optional earnings display on stock page. See BUILD_PLAN.md.

title: Phase 6: Polish & Production
description: Auth flow, user preferences, UI polish, production deployment on AWS

title: Phase 6: Polish & Production Prep
description: Supabase Auth, user preferences (risk tolerance, tax bracket, horizon), UI/UX polish (loading/error/empty states, mobile responsive), onboarding flow, AWS production infra (ECS, RDS, ElastiCache, S3+CloudFront), monitoring. See BUILD_PLAN.md.

title: Phase 2: Scoring Engine
description: Configuration-driven scoring system. Five factors (growth, profitability, valuation, momentum, quality) with YAML configs, percentile calculation, scoring API endpoints, score storage, and frontend score display. See BUILD_PLAN.md for full details.
close_reason: Phase 2 complete: scoring engine with 5 factors, YAML configs, API endpoints, and frontend score display
